original_title: Pyû to fuku! Jagâ: Ima, yuki ni yukimasu
overview: The story follows a hapless budding guitarist nicknamed "Piyohiko" who gets steered into the music business by a mysterious man named Jaguar — if Piyohiko would play a recorder instead of a guitar.  (Source: Anime News Network)
title: Pyû to fuku! Jagâ: Ima, yuki ni yukimasu
